cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Step__c.name: cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Step__c
cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Step__c.description: This table stores the definitions of the workflow step.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Classname__c.description: Callable class that implements the Workflow Step.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: High-level description of the Workflow Step features.

cgcloud__Entity__c.description: Input or output .json file that this step targets.

cgcloud__Method__c.description: Method that's to be passed to the Workflow Step.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the business object API workflow step applies.

cgcloud__Unique_Key__c.description: Field stores schema constraints. This is a technical field that the workflow updates.
